issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
К сожалению, мы не можем воспроизвести проблему с вашими настройками.

1. Зайдите, пожалуйста, в настройки > Safari > расширения, отключите все расширения AdGuard и включите снова.
2. Зайдите в приложение AdGuard и обновите фильтры, подождите 2-3 минуты не закрывая приложение.
3. Перезагрузите устройство
4. Зайдите на этот сайт и проверьте наличие рекламы, ее быть не должно.

Если реклама останется, обратитесь в нашу поддержку support@adguard.com

comment.body:
<details><summary>Screenshot when AdGuard Browser Extension works correctly</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-08-21 19-03-17](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/98787049/152e4250-9fb7-4243-a4ca-50648c7dced6)

</details> 

I cannot reproduce your issue as the above screenshot taken when AdGuard Browser Extension is installed on Google Chrome desktop web browser and no user rules are applied.

It seems that you reported the issue while you use the following applications and you activate the subscribed filters into one of them:
 - [Stargon Browser](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.onecook.browser)
 - [Soul Browser](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mycompany.app.soulbrowser)

The above applications does not support CSS rule, Extended CSS, etc as the following test screenshot:

<details><summary>The test screenshot</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-08-21 19-04-17](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/98787049/2d16fbe5-2188-4b91-a3dd-4888d1a62bc5)

</details> 

If so, please remove the application you use and use [AdGuard for Android](https://adguard.com/ko/adguard-android/overview.html) and Chrome web browser.

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce error like on the screenshot.
It looks like that `Online Malicious URL Blocklist` filter list is blocking this website, so please try to add this rule:
```adblock
||tradeinsights.net$all,badfilter
```
to user rules.
Also please check if issue occurs with DNS filtering disabled.

Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body: After checking the filters above, I've noticed that sometimes it just doesn't work, regardless of whether the filters are on or not. I've also managed to click to the button when all of these filters are on, but it's easier to achieve when the filters are off. I checked the network page in developer tools but found nothing special. I'm guessing this could be an unstable connection due to network fluctuations.

Cannot reproduce with your settings.

Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

```
roblox.com###Skyscraper-Abp-Right

```
Пожалуйста, пришлите сохраненную страницу на `filters@adguard.com`

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/159298](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FAdguardTeam%2FAdguardFilters%2Fissues%2F159298) ### Comment > I applied fix #159298 (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/159298) per the comment by BlazDT (re: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/cbc96e48046a8bd262f115d93f36c4f3a7a9e3b5) and still receive the redirect. > > I tried it both in the allow list (per the comment header: 'BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt') and user rules. Neither works and displayPOVadblockerEnabled:true is still present via view-source. > > The only way the website works is to place the root URI into the allow list. Of course, search results are flooded with extraneous, and somewhat unrelated, ads. ### Screenshots

с 90% до 1%. Так и должно быть или нужно что то исправить?

comment.body:
> и в Viber и в других приложениях

Viber использует свои домены для доставки рекламы, их от нерекламных не отличить. Почти как в Telegram, только их трафик вообще не проанализировать, а рекламы в отличие от вайбера, там практически нет (кроме админского спама в группах).

Can displayPOVadblockerEnabled somehow be set to false?
